system.effects: Decrease Hull Integrity by 1d5-1 if Frigate, Transport, or Raider, or by 1d5 if light cruiser, cruiser, or larger.  Ship starts with Modified Drive Archeotech, plus one more Archeotech component of player choice. Gain +10 Manoeuvrability within 5 VU's of a planet.

description.value: Decrease Hull Integrity by 1d5-1 if Frigate, Transport, or Raider, or by 1d5 if light cruiser, cruiser, or larger. Ship starts with Modified Drive Archeotech, plus one more Archeotech component of player choice. Gain +10 Manoeuvrability within 5 VU's of a planet.
